labDescription: At the BCI4Kids lab in the BME Program, we aim to translate the evolving brain-computer interface space for children. We are focused on the multitude of digital engineering problems facing BCI translation to children: from digital signal processing, machine learning, and analysis of neurophysiological signals, to the development of engaging, exciting applications for children to play with BCI systems.
currentResearchTopics: Creating engaging applications and games for BCI systems
